name: Hero's Land
storyline: Hero’s Land is an open-world, multi-player survival game. In here, you can unlock distinctive heroes as you progress your exploration, or you can train on-map pets to be your combat partners. Don’t forget that you can make friends, put together a team, and build a home of your own team. Stay alive!
